name: Show All The Things
description: Developing in production sucks, but when you *have* to do it, this will make things a lot easier. You wrap an element around the stuff you're developing, with style="display:none;" and id="ninja". Turning this Stylish on will show the element, but only for you. Nice.
css: #ninja {display:inline-block!important;} /* i really want this to be global */
